langReco.reco

Class LanguageRecognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • langReco.reco.LanguageRecognizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaselineLanguageRecognizer

    public abstract class LanguageRecognizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class LanguageRecognizer: abstract class that every language recognition system has to implement.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Field Detail

      • lang

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> lang
        List of languages present in the train corpus + unk for a potential unknown language

      • langNgramCountMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> langNgramCountMap
        Map of ngram counter file paths associated with each language as each language can be associated with several language models. The keys to the first map are the ISO names of the languages (e.g., "fr") and the keys to the second map are the names associated with each file containing a language model (e.g., "fr-bigrams"). The values of the second map are the file path associated with the given language name (e.g., "ngramCounts/fr-bigrams.lm").

        Accessor to the lang attribute.
        Returns:
        the list of languages of the recognition system.

      • getLangNgramCountMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getLangNgramCountMap()
        Accessor to the langNgramCountMap attribute.
        Returns:
        the map of language file paths of the recognition system.

      • getLanguages

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getLanguages()
        Accessor to the languages of the langNgramCountMap attribute.
        Returns:
        the set of languages for which at least one file path is declared.

      • getNgramCountNames

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getNgramCountNames(java.lang.String lang)
        Accessor to the language model names of a particular language in the langNgramCountMap attribute.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language to consider.
        Returns:
        the set of language model names for the given language.

      • getNgramCountPath

        protected java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getNgramCountPath(java.lang.String lang)
        Method returning a collection of language model file paths associated with a language.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language to consider.
        Returns:
        the collection of language model files for the given language.

      • getNgramCountPath

        protected java.lang.String getNgramCountPath(java.lang.String lang,
                                 java.lang.String ngramCountName)
        Accessor to the language model file path of a particular language model name in the langNgramCountMap attribute.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language to consider.
        ngramCountName - the name of the language model to consider.
        Returns:
        the file path of the language model whose language and model name are given.

      • addTuple2LangNgramCountMap

        private void addTuple2LangNgramCountMap(java.lang.String lang,
                              java.lang.String ngramCountName,
                              java.lang.String ngramCountFilePath)
        Method adding a language model file path to the langNgramCountMap attribute.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language to consider.
        ngramCountName - the name of the language model to add.
        ngramCountFilePath - the file path of the language model to add.

      • loadNgramCountPath4Lang

        public void loadNgramCountPath4Lang(java.lang.String configFile)
        Method parsing a configuration file where each line is a tuple in the following format: lang ngramCountName ngramCountFilePath (each value is separated by a whitespace character; lines started with # are not considered) This method initialized the langNgramCountMap attribute with the language models used in the recognition system.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the file path of the configuration file containing the information on the language models (language, name and file path).

      • recognizeSentenceLanguage

        public abstract java.lang.String recognizeSentenceLanguage(java.lang.String sentence)
        Method recognizing and returning the language of the given sentence by choosing randomly one of the languages of the recognition system (the unknown language can also be picked up). --> the is the only method to implement!
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence whose language is to recognize.
        Returns:
        the language of the sentence as recognized by the recognition system.

      • recognizeFileLanguage

        public void recognizeFileLanguage(java.lang.String testSentenceFilePath,
                         java.lang.String hypLangFilePath)
        Method processing the sentences of a given reference file (one per line), and writing the hypothesis language of each sentence in another file. (this is the first version of the recognizeFileLanguage() method)
        Parameters:
        testSentenceFilePath - the reference file containing the sentences whose language is to recognize.
        hypLangFilePath - the hypothesis file of languages recognized by the recognition system.
